job description:
Research, design, develop, test, and deploy machine learning systems. Research, develop and enhance quantitative models (predictive, sentiment, time series, topic modeling, spell check, etc.) using NLP and machine learning to build AI searches System within the scope of job Recruiting; Utilize statistical natural language processing to mine unstructured data, and create insights; analyze and model structured data using advanced statistical methods and implement algorithms and software needed to perform analyses. Using data and predictive algorithms to find the best solution in order to increase user engagement and search revenue and influence the company’s overall strategy. Obtaining data and converting it so it can be processes (e.g. Variable Identification, Univariate Analysis, Bi-variate Analysis, Missing values treatment, Outlier treatment, Variable transformation, Variable creation). Using algorithms to create models with respect to the problem to be solved (e.g. test the model in a limited deploy for a part of the traffic).
